com.team08storyapp

Class NetworkChangeReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.team08storyapp.NetworkChangeReceiver

  • public class NetworkChangeReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    NetworkChangeReceiver is a BroadcastReceiver that is responsible for detecting the network state change of the device, registered in manifest. When the network is on, the receiver calls SycnManger to sync, and sync will be done if it's needed. When lose the network, receiver will simply toast a message to the user and let them know the state of network.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen
